content: **hazel crochet beanie** ======================================= the hazel beanie is beautifully cozy worked from the bottom up with knit-look ribbing and an easy one-row repeat the shaping at the top creates a smooth finish with minimal bulk and you can add an optional pom pom for a fun touch make it in a solid color or stripes - the choice is yours **sizes** this pattern is written for 7 sizes to fit the following head circumference newborn 12 -14 / 30 5cm - 35 5cm baby 14 -16 / 35 5cm - 40 5cm toddler 16 -18 / 40 5cm - 45 5cm child 18 -20 / 45 5cm - 51cm tween 20 -22 / 51cm - 56cm adult s 22 -23 / 56cm - 58 5cm adult l 23 -24 / 58 5cm - 61cm **video** this pattern includes a full video tutorial **materials** **yarn ** any #4/worsted weight yarn newborn 75 yds / 69m baby 100 yds / 91m toddler 130 yds / 119m child 155 yds / 142m tween 190 yds / 174m adult small 210 yds / 192m adult large 250 yds / 229m **hook ** 5 5mm i-9 crochet hook 3 or hook required to meet gauge --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 4 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2025 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 3 https //shrsl com/3p74i 4 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
